about.title: About LiteBI Studio
about.subtitle: {{count}} Results | {{mode}}
about.tagline: The lightweight business intelligence platform directly in your browser.
about.philosophy_description: LiteBI Studio was developed with the goal of making data analysis as simple and secure as possible. Unlike traditional BI tools, your data never leaves your browser with LiteBI Studio.
about.point_privacy_desc: No server storage, no cloud constraints.
about.point_speed_desc: Local processing using SQLite WASM technology.
about.point_offline_desc: Works even without an active internet connection.
about.support_text: Do you have questions or feedback We look forward to your message.
about.settings_hint: Learn more about the project, the version and the vision behind LiteBI Studio.

record_detail.comment_placeholder: Enter your notes or verification results here...

system_health.title: System Diagnostics & Health
system_health.overview_snapshot_hint: Each health check run stores a snapshot that can be evaluated in reporting.
system_health.snapshot_cleanup_admin_only: This action is only available in admin mode.
system_health.snapshot_cleanup_confirm: Delete old diagnostic snapshots? Entries older than {{days}} days will be removed (latest {{keep}} are kept).
system_health.snapshot_cleanup_failed: Old diagnostic snapshots could not be deleted:
system_health.opfs_description: The database is stored in an isolated, high-performance area of the browser. This storage is persistent but managed by the browser.
system_health.quick_fix_success: Quick fix completed. {{count}} index(es) created or confirmed.
system_health.quick_fix_none: No automatic fix could be generated for this finding.
system_health.client_log_level_debug_detail: Verbose browser logging may affect performance.
system_health.client_backup_missing_detail: Create a backup to improve recovery readiness.
